title: Theater Of The New Ear
description:
Theater Of The New Ear (Sirius Satellite Radio)


"Sawbones," written and directed by Joel and Ethan Coen.
Actors: Steve Buscemi, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Brooke Smith, 
John Slattery, Marcia Gay Harden and John Goodman.


"Hope Leaves the Theater," written and directed by Charlie Kaufman.
Actors: Hope Davis, Peter Dinklage and Meryl Streep.


Music Composed and Conducted by Carter Burwell
performed by The Parabola Ensemble




Photos & Samples
   
  <a href=" http://www.carterburwell.com/projects/TONE.html#Reviews" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.carterburwell.com/projects/TONE.html#Reviews</a>





* There was a third play called "Anomalisa", which unfortunately I do not have.

* If your a fan of any of these people, especially Charlie Kaufman,
download & listen, asap.
